Electrical Engineer - Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET) Job at African Industries Group (AIG)




        
    

        
        African Industries Group (AIG) is a diversified global conglomerate with a legacy of 52 years of business excellence and sustainable growth. It is headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria. It has been contributing to Nigeria’s socio-economic growth and industrial development and is equally committed towards the nurturing and development of the local community.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer - Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET)
Job Location: Gujeni Village, Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose
     

            
    




	To learn and support electrical maintenance and operation activities in the plant, gaining hands-on experience in equipment handling, troubleshooting, and industrial power systems for professional development.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in maintenance and inspection of electrical systems, including motors, transformers, switchgear, and MCC panels.
	Support senior engineers in troubleshooting and repairing electrical faults.
	Observe and learn safe operating procedures, isolation practices, and maintenance protocols.
	Participate in preventive maintenance schedules and record daily maintenance activities.
	Monitor equipment performance and report abnormalities to supervisors.
	Assist in energy monitoring, load management, and basic electrical testing.
	Learn the use of tools, testing instruments, and maintenance documentation systems.


Qualifications and Skills


	B.Eng. or HND in Electrical / Electrical & Electronics Engineering.
	0 - 2 years of relevant experience (industrial internship or NYSC experience preferred).
	Basic understanding of electrical systems, control circuits, and safety standards.
	Eagerness to learn, with good communication and teamwork skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic electrical drafting tools is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated resume to: jamal.ogidan@africanindustries.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.

	Proficiency in SQL Server / PostgreSQL / MySQL/Oracle, including writing complex queries, stored procedures, and indexing.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Relation Officer",
  "description": "Dbell Logistics is proud to provide you innovative, reliable, swift, global logistics solutions. With our team of dedicated Certified Professionals and their wealth of experience in the Industry, we understand what it takes to fulfill our customers&rsquo; exact needs. We continually invest in our infrastructure to ensure we provide you a wholly customer-centric service

In our quest to change the norm, we are not only involved in the pickup and packaging of your products for Local and International freight; our team will always guide you through the documentation processes to ensure all your freight move with the right document at all times.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Relation Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Summary


	We are looking for a Relationship Officer to build and maintain relationships with clients and customers.
	The ideal candidate will have strong interpersonal skills, sales experience, and the ability to understand customer needs and preferences.


Responsibilities
